I am writing to you on behalf of Rosetta Stone Ltd. ("Rosetta Stone"). Rosetta Stone is the developer and owner of various world leading computer software products for learning foreign languages (the "Rosetta Stone Software"). The Rosetta Stone Software is copyrighted and protected by United States and international law and marketed and sold under the famous ROSETTA STONE(r) trademark. The software is a boxed product, governed under an End User License Agreement.

- The neiman marcus site (see link below) keeps appearing as a paid ad after repeated requests for takedowns/ it keeps coming up again after being taken down. Thought it might be worth requesting its removal on this webform as well, if it is the right forum for this.
